item.title: Raichur Achieves City Corporation Status: A Landmark Development
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: The Karnataka Municipal Corporations Act 1976, under Sections 3, 4, and 503, was invoked to upgrade Raichur's status from city municipal area to city corporation, as officially announced by the state govt. Raichur meets all the requisite criteria for this elevation, including a population exceeding 3 lakh, population density surpassing 3,000 residents per square km, annual revenue collection above Rs 6 crore from both tax and non-tax sources during the previous census period, and over 5...]]>
item.author: Tnn

item.title: Raichur: Young man drowns in lake while washing horse, missing
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Young man drowns in lake while washing horse, missing
Vartha Bharati | 13-11-2024 | 20:12:00 IST
Representational Image
Raichur: In a tragic incident a young man went missing after drowning while washing horse in the Siddrampura lake here in the outskirts of the city.
The missing youth has been identified as Azim (22), a resident of Zahirabad.
According to reports, local police and fire and emergency services personnel have continued their search operation for the missing youth ....]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
